name: Michael SILUK, Jr., Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Michael SILUK, Jr., Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of February, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

110 A.3d 993
Michael SILUK, Jr., Appellant v. John WETZEL, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellee.
